description: Dropbox is a file hosting service that offers cloud storage, file synchronization, personal cloud, and client software.
name: dropbox
title: Dropbox

actions.description: Copy a file or folder to a different location in the user's Dropbox. If the source path is a folder all its contents will be copied.
actions.name: copy

properties.description: Name of the file with the extension. Don't fill in if you want a folder.
properties.name: filename
properties.label: Filename

properties.description: The path which the file or folder should be copyed from.  Root is /.
properties.name: source
properties.label: Source path

properties.description: The path which the file or folder should be copyed to.  Root is /.
properties.name: destination
properties.label: Destination path

actions.title: Copy

actions.description: Create a folder at a given path.
actions.name: createFolder

properties.description: The path of the new folder. Root is /.
properties.name: destination
properties.label: Folder path/name

actions.title: Create new folder

actions.description: Create a new .paper file on which you can write at a given path
actions.name: createTextFile

properties.description: The path of the new paper file. Starts with / as root.
properties.name: destination
properties.label: Paper path/name

actions.title: Create a new paper file

actions.description: Delete the file or folder at a given path. If the path is a folder, all its contents will be deleted too.
actions.name: delete

properties.description: Path of the file or folder. Root is /.
properties.name: source
properties.label: Path

properties.description: Name of the file. Leave empty if you want to delete a folder.
properties.name: filename
properties.label: Filename

actions.title: Delete

actions.description: Get a temporary link to stream content of a file. This link will expire in four hours and afterwards you will get 410 Gone. This URL should not be used to display content directly in the browser. The Content-Type of the link is determined automatically by the file's mime type.
actions.name: getFileLink

properties.description: The path to the file you want a temporary link to.  Root is /.
properties.name: source
properties.label: Path to the file

properties.description: Name of the file with the extension.
properties.name: filename
properties.label: Filename

actions.title: Get file link

properties.description: Path of the filename. Inputting nothing searches root.
properties.name: source
properties.label: Path

actions.description: Move a file or folder to a different location in the user's Dropbox. If the source path is a folder all its contents will be moved. Note that we do not currently support case-only renaming.
actions.name: move

properties.description: Name of the file with the extension. Don't fill in if you want a folder.
properties.name: filename
properties.label: Filename

properties.description: Path in the user's Dropbox to be moved.  Root is /.
properties.name: source
properties.label: Source path

properties.description: Path in the user's Dropbox that is the destination. Root is /.
properties.name: destination
properties.label: Destination path

actions.title: Move

actions.description: Searches for files and folders. Can only be used to retrieve a maximum of 10,000 matches. Recent changes may not immediately be reflected in search results due to a short delay in indexing. Duplicate results may be returned across pages. Some results may not be returned.
actions.name: search

properties.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.Must have length of at most 1000 and not be null.
properties.name: searchString
properties.label: Search string

actions.title: Search

actions.description: Create a new file up to a size of 150MB with the contents provided in the request.
actions.name: uploadFile

properties.description: The object property which contains a reference to the file to be written.
properties.name: fileEntry
properties.label: File

properties.description: The path to which the file should be written.
properties.name: destination
properties.label: Destination path

properties.description: Name of the file. Needs to have the appropriate extension.
properties.name: filename
properties.label: Filename

actions.title: Upload file
